about_the_game:
Pockets are important. And having space to store your goodies is very important for your RPG travels. With the Inventory Expansion 1, players are granted Pocket Expansion + 1000 threefold! That means 3,000 additional item inventory slots to store all of your knick knacks!

The Inventory Expansion 1 includes:
Inventory Expansion 1 - Increases item iventory amount by 1000. Pocket Expansion + 1000.
Inventory Expansion 2 - Increases item iventory amount by 1000. Pocket Expansion + 1000.
Inventory Expansion 3 - Increases item iventory amount by 1000. Pocket Expansion + 1000.
